name: Thinking outside the box of code with Leslie Lamport (Changelog Interviews #552)
summary: Leslie Lamport is a computer scientist &amp; mathematician who won ACM’s Turing Award in 2013 for his fundamental contributions to the theory and practice of distributed and concurrent systems. He also created LaTeX and TLA+, a high-level language for “writing down the ideas that go into the program before you do any c...
